modName: Remove Spells from Master Conjurer - All Conjuration Spells
summary: Remove the Conjuration Spells from "Master Conjurer - All Conjuration Spells"
descriptionHtml:
Removes all the spells from "Master Conjuration - All Conjuration Spells"

Click [url=http://http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68893/?]here[/url] for a direct link to the main mod and follow the steps to add the removal spell. Then open your command console and type: bat removespells

[color=#ffff00]If the hyperlink doesn't work, go here: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68893/]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68893/[/url]?[/color]
author: iPlaySkyrim101
